publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2862 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Deputy Convenership of Committees—That the Parliament agrees that the deputy Convener of the Scottish Parliamentary Standards Commissioner Bill Committee be appointed from the Labour Party. Supported by: Euan Robson*

S1M-2862 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Deputy Convenership of Committees—That the Parliament agrees that the deputy Convener of the Scottish Parliamentary Standards Commissioner Bill Committee be appointed from the Labour Party. Supported by: Euan Robson
